name: SWAP (itch) (SnowconeGames)
description:
Multiplayer competitive cooking game, developed for UQAC Winter Wonderjam 2018 and winner of 1st place. Requires at least two controllers to play.

The theme of the gamejam was "Order and Disorder" and the styles were "competition" and "management".

Developed on Unity Engine in 48 hours.
